Factsheet

Developer:
Madison Karrh
Based in Chicago, IL
Funded By:
WINGS Interactive
Release date:
17 Feb, 2023
Platforms:
Steam
Website:
wetheart.games
Regular Price:
USD 10.99

Description

Birth is an adventure puzzle game about constructing a creature from spare bones and organs found around the city in order to quell your loneliness.

History

Birth is developed solely by Madison Karrh. She has spent most of her twenties living alone in tiny studio apartments. Birth is her exploration of day-to-day loneliness. Every piece of Birth is hand-drawn and doused with love, feeling and a bit of grief. Enjoy.

Features

  • Collect bones and organs in hand-drawn museums, coffee shops, alleys, flower shops, libraries, markets, bakeries and more.
  • Solve physics-based puzzles and interact with unique, interesting creatures.
  • Find and spend hidden tokens to discover secrets.

Awards & Recognition

Selected Articles

  • The distinctive, creepy-yet-beautiful art style really sets it apart from just about everything in gaming today.
    Ian Walker, Kotaku
  • Birth is like if plague doctors and 2004 web series Salad Fingers were beautiful instead of deeply upsetting.
    Rebekah Valentine, IGN
  • It could qualify for a Wholesome Direct, were it not for all the animal corpses.
    Chris Schilling, EDGE Magazine

About Madison Karrh

Boilerplate
Madison Karrh is a solo developer, focused on making short personal games full of heart. She is inspired by libraries, bugs, bones and decay.
More information
More information on Madison Karrh, our logo & relevant media are available here.

About WINGS Interactive

Boilerplate
WINGS invests in indie games by teams in which women and marginalized gender developers hold key positions.
More information
